name: Italian Peasant Bread Soup
author: Anonymous
summary: Warm up to the delicious, nutritious taste of Italian Peasant Soup. With all the calcium of eight ounces of milk in just two slices of Wonder Classic White Bread, this soup is not only good, it's good for you, too.
ingredients: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, with liquid
2 cups low sodium vegetable juice cocktail or tomato juice
directions: Cut bread into 3 strips; cut each strip into thirds, making 9 cubes
Place bread cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet
Bake 15 minutes or until very crisp
Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven
Add onion, carrot, celery and garlic
Cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are quite tender, about 8 to 10 minutes
Stir in remaining ingredients, except crisp bread cubes and Parmesan cheese
Heat to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 25 to 30 minutes
To serve, ladle soup into individual serving bowls and top each with crisp bread cubes
